forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds overnight. Low 47F. SSE winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
